ValidationRule.description: Based on the selection in Renewal Classification picklist, check if the MSP APU model and MSP Engine model are mapped to a known DS template ID. APU DS template and/or Engine DS template can't be unknown if Renewal classification is expecting them.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
OR( AND(OR( ISPICKVAL (Renewal_Classification__c, "Engines Only"), ISPICKVAL (Renewal_Classification__c, "Engines & APU"), ISPICKVAL (Renewal_Classification__c, "Addendum & Engines"), ISPICKVAL (Renewal_Classification__c, "Addendum, Engines &APU")), Engine_DST__c = "Unknown"),
AND(OR( ISPICKVAL (Renewal_Classification__c, "APU Only"), ISPICKVAL (Renewal_Classification__c, "Engines & APU"), ISPICKVAL (Renewal_Classification__c, "Addendum & APU"), ISPICKVAL (Renewal_Classification__c, "Addendum, Engines &APU")), APU_DST__c = "Unknown") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage:
Location: Top of page
Error Message: Unknown APU DS Template or Unknown Engine DS Template. Correct Renewal Classification, MSP APU model or MSP Engine model.
